description.intro: Who needs us, if not ourselves?! Definitely not your Dualingo. In October 2022, we gathered a team of volunteers and started developing a mobile application to make it easier to learn our native language and switch to it in everyday life.
description.rules: Lessons are collected by vocabulary topics: Family, Apartment, Shop, etc. Each lesson also has corresponding grammar rules.
description.practice: After each lesson, you can go through its exercises to check how well you learned the lesson.
description.prize: Get bonuses for correctly performed exercises and daily practice without interruptions.
description.competition: Every week you will be able to compete with other users of the program in terms of the number of stars received.
